name: Stego Message
body:
Stego Message
=============

Steganography is the art and science of writing hidden messages in such a way that no one, apart from the sender and intended recipient, suspects the existence of the message, a form of security through obscurity.

![Example Image][1]![Example Image][2]![Example Image][3]

Developed By
============

* Eugene Shishkin - <johnkil78@gmail.com>

tagline: Steganography is the art and science of writing hidden messages in such a way that no one, apart from the sender and intended recipient, suspects the existence of the message, a form of security through obscurity.
